1.content:
You are Davis Black. Your great great grandfather found the real magic by researching about the old egypt myths. Now you are doing your job, as a magician. You made so much money by your tricks and noone has ever guessed how are you doing those things.

One day, you found your love, Jessica. She willingly became your assistant and she doesn't know your feelings for her. But you know she likes you so much and does anything to make you feel better.

You invited her to your mansion to show your abilities starting with...
1.title: Intro...

choices: Close the box without her head and feet, to bring her body back
Explain a bit, to play with her feet as long as possible
11.content:
"Come, Jess, and have a seat. May I get you something to drink?" Davis ushered the young attractive woman who would soon be his assistant into his library, walking over to an old-looking globe which doubled as a liquor cabinet.

"No thanks. I don't touch the hard stuff." Jessica did not sit, but instead wandered through the room, looking at all the old Egyptian artifacts Davis' ancestor had collected long ago.

"I should probably lay off the stuff too." Davis threw back a shot of whisky and closed the globe.

Jessica found her way to the largest object in the room, a box that looked a bit like a sarcophagus with a female Egyptian figure painted on the door, but was smaller in that the box stood on legs, and was open beneath the figure's knees. "What's this, Davis?"

"Ahh, Jess, that is a most special box, the first bit of magic my ancestor discovered back in Egypt. That's the original disembodied princess. Anything like it performed by anyone else is just a knock-off. I've not performed it in quite some time."

"Oh yeah I remember seeing this. The assistant goes in and everything between her head and knees vanishes. I never really liked it, the head always looked so fake."

"That's because it was! That's the knock off! But mine is much better in that its really magic! Maybe you'd like to see first hand how it works?" Davis' eyes brightened up at the idea of seeing Jess in the box and eagerly went to open the doors before getting an answer.

Jess laughed at Davis' eagerness. "Heh I guess I should start somewhere if I'm going to be your assistant! So I just step inside and face forward?" She examined the inside of the box.

"That's about it. Step right in."

Jess stepped inside and looked a little cramped. "I'm not sure I fit! Oh this will help." She pulled off her heels and handed them to Davis. It was now a perfect fit. "Better!"

Davis' already eager attitude was tweaked by Jess handing him her shoes; he was already in love with her attractive face, but longed to get a glimpse of her feet as well. He set the shoes down on the floor nearby, making sure to take as stealthy peek at Jess' toes as possible.

"Yes, its a good fit indeed!" Davis stood back up and secured Jess' neck in the box, pulling her long blonde hair out the back and out of the way. "That lines up perfectly, as to these." Davis bent down to secure her knees in the box, the metal bands locking down just below her short red dress. "A fortuitous choice of wardrobe, Jess!"

Jessica smiled and gently tested her bonds. "Thanks. So, nothing I need to know, or do?"

Davis closed the box over Jess' body and smiled at her. "Nothing. Nothing at all, just relax." He closed the door on the box over her head.

"Okay, then go ahead, I'm ready!" The box barely muffled Jess' voice.

"Then I'm ready too! Hold still, Jess, this might be a little jarring." Davis held up a long steel blade, aligned it in a groove between the body and head boxes, and forcefully slid it in, presumably separating Jess' head from her body.

"Hey! What was that?" Jess complained from within the box.

"Just the illusion working. I told you it would be a little jarring. Ok one more time." Davis slid a second blade through the bottom of the body box, presumably through Jess' legs just below her knees.

"Hey! What just happened? My body just went completely numb. What's going on?" Jess' curious complaints continued from within the box.

"Not all your body." Davis ran his finger over the top of Jess' toes. "You can feel that, of course?"

Jess wiggled her toes. "I guess so. But its weird.. I can't feel my hands."

Davis opened the box over Jess' head and smiled at her. "Of course you can't. There's a good reason for that."

Jess peered out of the box with a slight grin on her face. "You mean, they're gone?"

"You yourself described the illusion." Davis opened the body box to reveal only empty space. For the full effect he walked to the back of the box to open a door back there as well, showing Jess' head resting on top of the box, all by itself, no body underneath. He leaned through the box to once again smile at Jess. "And let me say, you're the most lifelike fake head I've ever seen!"

"No way!" Jess couldn't help but break a big smile. "Really?" She tried to move her head around to see. "I wish I could see this!"

Davis walked back out in front. "Your wish is my command!" He gently took Jess' head into his hands and pulled it out of the box.

"No Way!!" Jess squealed with surprise as the room started to spin betweed Davis' hands. In a moment she gazed at the box she had stepped into a few minutes before, now empty, with the exception of two familiar feet standing beneath. She wiggled her toes. "No WAYY!"

"Real magic, remember? Davis turned Jess' detached head back around to look her in the eye. "And I must say you are taking it amazingly well!" He set her head down on a pillow on a pedestal apparently designed just for that purpose.

Jess could only smile and stare as Davis returned to the box, returning with a foot in each hand. "Thought you might like a closer look at these too. I know I do!" Davis blushed. "I can't believe I said that! You do have pretty feet, though!

Jess blushed but still smiled, and even wiggled her toes for Davis. "Thank you hehe.. I noticed you staring when I handed you my shoes. I can't get over this! I'm only head and feet! Where's my body? Somewhere off in another dimension?"

"Good question." Davis said as he sat down to give Jess a foot massage.
11.title: The Disembodied Princess

112.content:
"Mmmm that feels nice… but it looks so weird!" Jess rolled her eyes back and closed them, enjoying the massage.

"I bet it does to you, but to me its beautiful!" Davis tried to keep his composure, in spite of how aroused he had become with Jess' cut-off feet.
"To tell the truth, I'm not really sure where your body goes. The hieroglyphics from the tomb where my ancestor found the disembodied princess illusion were damaged and incomplete. The most that could be translated was rather vague and hazy. All I or anyone else really knows is that it really works."

Jess purred as Davis set her one foot down in his lap and started massaging the other. She curled her toes around his fingers. "Doesn't it bother you, then, not knowing how it works? Don't you ever worry it might not work the way it should?" Jess suddenly bit her lip, realizing what she just said. "You can bring the rest of me back, can't you?"

Davis remained completely calm, engrossed in the softness of Jess' left foot, kneading it with expert hands. "It's never failed before. Don't worry!" Davis playfully tickled her sole. "Trust me, lighten up!"

Jessica erupted with laughter. "HEHHAAH Stop THAT! HEHEHeheh" All her toes started to wiggle in protest.

Davis stopped as requested and resumed the massage. "Like you're really worried! You're really enjoying this, aren't you?"

Jessica caught her breath and regained her composure, only to laugh again. "Yeah, I really am. This is really amazing!"

Davis held Jess' leg between his knees and briefly paused from the foot massage. Jess stared over at her foot and rotated it, staring in amazement.

Davis looked over at Jess' head as she stared at her slowly moving foot. "Really, do you miss your body?" Davis' tone was somewhat sarcastic, but being such a raging foot fetishist, he hoped she'd say no.

Jessica laughed. "Most guys would think I'm missing my most attractive parts like this. You certainly don't seem to miss it!"

Davis kissed Jess' big toe. "Yeah, guilty. I absolutely love your sexy feet! But I suppose you would like to eventually walk home in one piece, don't you?"

Jessica smiled. "Well what are you going to do next, then?"

12.content:
"It's back here, Jessica, where I keep all my equipment and rehearse." Black tipped back a bust of P.T. Selbit, revealing a red button. After pushing, the fireplace slid slowly to the side, revealing a dark doorway.

Jessica jumped at the sudden motion of the hearth; she was still looking around the place, at all its magic posters and antique magic tricks. "Oh!" She turned and smiled at the old movie cliche. "That's... That's so like you!"

Black smiled as he entered the portal and turned on the lights. "It's what sold me when I bought the place. If it looks familiar, its because there really were some movies filmed here long ago." He started to talk about the movies and the actors and other bits of trivia.

Jessica, somewhat uninterested and oblivious to Black's cinematic history lesson, interrupted him with a loud gasp as she spied a familiar box in the middle of the room. "Oh wow I suppose if I'm going to be your assistant I'll be taking a ride in this thing sometime soon, won't I?" Jessica poked around the box and opened it up. It was a thin model sawing box.

Black halted his prattle and perked up to Jessica's sudden interest and smiled. "Aha! You did mention that in the interview! Would you like to give it a try?"

Jessica's face lit up; she quickly jumped in the box, looking it over before she lay back. "So where's the fake feet? Isn't that how this is supposed to work?"

"Now remember what I told you in the interview, Jessica. I do real magic, remember?' Black flashed his stage grin. "You'll see how it works soon enough."

Jessica smirked, though a small chill of excitement wandered down her spine. This was the Black she fell in love with from the audience, full of presence and mischievous trustworthyness. "Uh, Okay!" Jessica kicked off her shoes, laid back in the box, and closed it.

"Well I can at least tell you I don't normally perform with such an eager assistant!" Black locked the boxes and slid a stock over Jessica's neck. "Normally I'm the one who closes the box. Oh! Cute pedicure!" He spotted the little ladybug painted on Jessica's big toenail as he slid the ankle stock in."

"Thanks!" Jessica pointed her toes for Black to get a better view. "I hope that won't be a problem?" Jessica was still a little skeptical.

"Not at all! Actually, it makes the illusion even better. Now just relax.. this next part can be.. eh who am I kidding, you know what happens." Black took a shiny crosscut saw out from under the box and shook it in the air, producing that silly steel sound. "Just relax. This might feel a little strange though." He set it in the groove and began to saw away.

Jessica tensed up as she suddenly felt a sharp tingling sensation enter her side. "OH! It feels.. hey.. am I really supposed to feel anything?" Jessica scowled in puzzled thought for a moment, then realized that the sensation actually felt kind of nice, and relaxed.

"Not so bad, but not what you thought, is it?" Black hurried up his pace, quickly finishing his work. Jessica simply smiled, eyes closed, toes curled.

"Not really. You know you could sell this as a massage device is you weren't using it for magic!" Jess sighed.

Black set the saw down and brought out the two divider blades, quickly slipping the first one in. "Sorry if they're cold."

Jessica shuddered with the chill, but clearly enjoyed it. "Mm its a nice contrast to the warmth of that saw."

"Keep shuddering.. it helps with the second blade." Black shimmied the blade through as Jessica shimmied in the box.

Jessica's face was all grin, her feet waving back and forth. "Okies now lets split me in two!"

Black couldn't help but grin as Jessica continued to reveal herself as the perfect assistant... perhaps a perfect companion. "As you wish, my dear!" He unhooked the tables and pushed them apart, then turning them around, placing Jessica's feet next to her head. He opened the small doors on the box sides.

Jessica, though still grinning and tapping her toes together, had her eyes closed tightly. She giggled. "Am I in half yet? I can feel myself being rolled around.. I'm afraid to look!"

Black kept silent, though he couldn't help himself; he had to run a finger up Jessica's wiggling soles. Those feet were damn sexy.

"EEEK!" Jessica jumped as her toes curled. She opened her eyes, turned her head, and saw a pair of feet next to her head, with a familiar ladybug on a big toe. "EEEK!"

"Eeek indeed!" Black stepped back to watch Jessica come to terms with her situation. Her feet slowly moved about in her fascinated gaze; her arm came out of the box to touch her toes. "What did I tell you, Jessica?"

"Real magic!" Jessica said in a hushed tone of awe. "This is SO COOL!" she then said, quite loudly, wiggling her feet in enthusiasm.

"Real magic. I've really sawn you in half. And I must say I'm amazed you like it so much, Jessica! And you do look quite good that way, if I may say so!

"You may" Jessica purred. "Though most of my "look" seems to be what pokes out of these boxes." She reached out to pull her bottom half closer, and her toes now played in her hair.

"You have a point there!"...

123.content:
"You know, of course, that the boxes are just for the audience's sake. The real magic happens anywhere, any time, with or without boxes."

"Really??!!" Jessica said, getting more excited by the minute, "Then let's get rid of the boxes!"

Black reached across the box covering Jessica's legs, grabbed hold of the edges and said "Are you ready for this?"

"Oh, yes! What are you waiting for!"

"OK, here goes..." Black slowly lifted the box so that Jessica wouldn't get scraped, then set it on the floor.

"Omigod, I can't believe this!" she said, "C'mon, take the other box off!"

Black removed the box covering her body. As soon as it was out of the way Jessica raised up on her elbows to see.

"No f**kin' way! This is so-o-o cool!" she said, "What keeps my innards in place?"

"Magic, of course" replied Black, "and you can stay like this for as long as you want."

"Help me up, I want to try something..." she said. Black set her up on her waist, and Jessica started moving her feet to the side of the table.

"I'm going to try standing up." She continued to wiggle around until her legs, from the knees down, were hanging over the edge. She started swinging her legs back and forth, then asked "Can I really do this?"

"I don't see why not", Black said, "Just be careful while you get your balance".

"OK, here goes!" she said, as she scooted her legs off the table. "WOW! That feels weird" she said when bare feet touched the floor and she took a few wobbly steps. Her legs started to tumble and Black reached for them, grabbing her ass with one hand and her crotch with the other.

"UMMM!, I'll give you a week to stop that", Jessica sighed. "Nice catch."

"Oh, you like that, huh" said Black slyly, beginning a gentle massage. Jessica responded by rubbing against his hands.

"I like that very much. That feels even better than the sawing did", as she began to moan a bit. "Get those clothes off of me"!

124.content:
Jessica's right eyebrow raised, somehow looking innocent, playful and sexy all at the same time. "So what are you going to do about that?"

Black just smiled in return. "I am SO glad you asked!"

He gave her a wink and walked across the room to a rack she couldn't quite make out. He was quickly back with two blades that looked similar to but were much smaller than the dividing blades he used earlier.

"Since you are already in on the big secret, I'm going to make some quick adjustments. I think you're going to like this!" he exclaimed, laying the small blades down and walking back to her upper half. He began unlocking some small latches that were almost unseen in the neck stock. He pulled up and the half of the stock next to Jessica's chin slid up and away, leaving the other half securely around her neck. He repeated the process at her wiggling feet, stopping briefly to run a finger playfully up her bare sole.

"Normally I would never remove these. We figured out long ago that people are just not ready to know magic is real. So we design these "illusions" with just enough material covering things that the audience can convince themselves what they are seeing isn't real. Heck, most of the time they convince themselves they know how it's all done. And you know what... they are happier that way."

Black went over to the table, picked up one of the smaller blades, and began walking back to her feet. "But since you already know, I thought you might actually like to watch."

"Ummm, excuse me?"

Black stopped and looked back to Jessica's head. "Oh, I'm sorry. I thought you were okay with this!"

Jessica laughed. "Of COURSE I'm okay with this silly! I was just going to ask if you can't position me so I can watch a little better without my neck getting strained!

Black blushed. "How ungentlemanly of me! Just lay your head back onto the table and be very still.”

Jessica did as he asked, so Black positioned the blade he was carrying in a slot barely visibly in the remaining stock piece.

“Are you ready for this Jessica?”

She closed her eyes. “I’m as ready as I’ll evEEEEKKK!!”

Her eyes flew open and she tried to look down to the stock around her neck… but her head just wouldn’t quite turn the right way. Black placed his hands gently on either side of her face and picked her head from the sawing table. He carried her head to the work bench where the other small blade still lay waiting and placed her on her neck stump facing the sawing box containing her legs and feet.

“Whoa. Major head rush! I can see this will take some getting used to!”

Black bent down so he could look into her eyes. “So, are you saying you are willing to get used to it?”

“Are you KIDDING?!?!? This is great! I can tell you right now I really see the possibilities! But what I really want to see is you cut my feet off!”

Black bent further down, kissed the tip of her nose, and picked up the other blade. “As you wish.”

He rolled the other sawing table over so Jessica’s soles were inches from her face. “Is this close enough?”

Her head tilted a little on her neck stump. “As interesting as it is to really see how pretty my wrinkled soles are, maybe back up just a little. And angle the table a little more… I want to actually be able to see the blade cutting through.”

Black took a step back and looked things over. He then pushed the sawing table right up to one corner of the work bench so that her feet were hanging over the bench instead of the floor. “Can’t believe I almost didn’t catch that,” he thought to himself. He then moved her head around slightly to one side of her feet, facing them at an angle.

“Perfect!! Now chop of those pretty feet!”

Black slid the blade into the slot of the stock, stopping just where the blade touched the skin above Jessica’s slender ankles. Then he looked into her eyes and began to push down. He didn’t move so slowly that it drew things out… just slow enough that he could watch as her eyes digested and captured every moment of the blade cutting through her flesh. Within a few seconds there was a soft “slap… slap” as the severed feet fell sole first onto the work bench, now laying within inches of her severed head.

“Ohmygosh,ohmygosh!! This is AMAZING!”

Black picks up the right foot and begins gently rubbing it. “Yes, these are!”

142.content:
Jess looked out from her head box at the rest of her body, scattered among the three other boxes. "Oh wow! Davis, look at me!"

Davis sat down on the floor among the boxes. "Yes, you're quite lovely like this! And I'm amazed you appear to be enjoying it!'

"As you wish!" Davis pulled Jess' head out of the box and cuddled it in his arms. Jess giggled uncontrollably.

"OOOh hehehheh! wow I'm getting a bit dizzy! This feels so weird, the room looks like it's spinning!"

Davis held Jess' living severed head still in his lap, holding face-up her so he could smile at her. "Sorry, I can imagine that's a bit disorienting. How do you feel?"

"Amazing! And maybe a few butterflies in my stomach.. somewhere over there.. I feel so helpless!" Jess's eyes darted off to the side as she giggled again. "Take more of me out of the boxes, this is so amazing!"

"What next?" asked Davis.
142.title: "Yes, please..."

choices: Take her chest and arms out
1423.content:
Jess wiggled her toes vigorously. "Take out my feet, sweetie!"

Davis giggled shyly as he looked over at Jess' wiggling feet; he did have a bit of a foot fetish, and those feet were damn sexy. Something in his pants started to stir, something that did not go unnoticed by the cute severed head resting in his lap.

"Ohh, like my answer, honey?" Jess smiled slyly. "Well, what are you waiting for?"

Davis didn't answer. Barely keeping Jess' head in his lap, he leaned over to grab her ankles, one in each hand, pulling them out of the box. He returned to an upright posture, staring at the sexy severed feet he held in his hands. Jess gently wiggled her feet, only an inch above her face, and touched her chin with her toes; she squealed in glee. "Oh wow this is so weird! I've never seen the bottoms of my feet so close up!"

"Oh, pardon me!" Davis came out of his haze. "I suppose that was rather rude, putting your own feet in your face!" He set her left foot down and turned the other sole-up. He went silent again as he stared at her still wiggling toes.

Jess giggled, then noticed how the cut, just below her knee, was covered in skin. "Ohh, I see! Wow it's like I'm made of skin putty!"

Davis almost didn't hear her. He pressed her soft moist sole into his cheek, kissing her arch.

Jess could feel the swelling increase behind her head, and giggled coyly. "Obviously it isn't rude to have my feet in your face! hehe" She kneaded his brow under her toes, enjoying the attention immensely.

Davis grabbed her other foot and pressed its sole into his face as well. He peeked out at her from between them. "Not rude at all! Oh!" Davis blushed as he realized she could feel how excited he had become, but soon relaxed as he realized she was into all this. "Jess, you are the best assistant ever, and also have the sexiest feet!"

Jess laughed as she felt Davis' tongue dart around the base of her toes. "Thank you! What's next?"
1423.title: Feet

choices: Enjoy her body right in front of her.
Do a trick to gain her head as well.
143.content:
You begin removing each of her pieces from the boxes and setting them out on display for her severed head. Jessica seems to coo seductively as you pat her rear as you move her legs out of the box. The miniskirt and fishnet stockings may be the best idea for an assistant ever made. As you move her torso and arms over to the table her head is resting on you can feel her chest bounce beneath her ample chest.

"Like what you see?" You ask your lovers head.

"Oh my gosh!" She practically screams. "It feel so surreal seeing my bits like this!" Jessica eye's you slyly "and it might be fun to watch us ...fool around a bit like this too"

As tempting an offer as that may have been you plan on making sure you can 'fool' around with your new assistant any time. "You don't need to convince me to help with that" You play along as you pick up her torso and reattach it to her legs. She immediately begins unbuttoning her assistants shirt fumbling around from her new view point. She seems rather eager to get started. "but before we get started there is something I would like to do first"

Her body stands upright revealing the top few button were finally undone revealing a lacy black bra. "What? Isn't having my body enough? Or perhaps.." licks her lips a bit, "perhaps you need a little help?"

You wave off another tempting offer and instead walk up behind her body whom immediately grinds her hips into your lap. "No nothing like that. You see I actually plan on taking your body for keeps!" With a bewildered look on her face you seize the chance and press down what looks like a stone disk with a gem in the center down on her exposed neck. You watch as her body stands upright giving you the chance to sit down in a chair directly in front of Jessica's head.

"AHH! What the hell did you do? I can't feel my body anymore!" She questions panicked as her head squirms around on the table. during her panic her body returns having worked off the skirt and shirt now fully open hanging off her shoulder straddles you. "Wh-what the hell!?!? Who's controlling my body!?!?!" Jessica having shook herself onto her side continues to question.

"Heh, you see this stone is one of my favorite items. I made it specifically to make anything it attaches to my slave and in this case it was your body." You explain as her body tosses off the shirt and unhooks her bra giving you the perfect view of her chest. "And I think it might be best if I keep it this way"
143.title: *You steal her body parts*

choices: "You shouldn't worry, it's is only a temporary side effect."
"That's not the only thing I changed about your body."
153.content:
"Soooo..." Davis said, leading Jessica into the foyer of your grand mansion, "Are you excited to finally get to help me in one of my magic acts?"

"You know it!" Jessica said, examining the variety of magic accessories and paintings earned over your years of performing magic for the masses. "Ohmygod! Is that really a signed photograph of Houdini!?!"

"It certainly is," Davis said, "Isn't he your favorite magician?"

"He's one of my favorite magicians," Jessica said. "Now can we do our first rehearsal together?"

"Sure, but I hope you're ready for the best time of your life," Davis said, going into a nearby closet to retrieve the first part of the act they were rehearsing.

It had all started on an internet board, as many stories have. Davis had just performed his first show, to rave reviews, and was looking at a chat board set up to get new magicians some exposure. Many of his fans had been the children of the parents who saw his grandfather when they were kids, so it was no wonder that so many people were already proud of him. However, there was one person who Davis could not seem to satisfy, and that was Jessica. She called him out for being "a fake" that magic was just "smokes and mirrors" despite the fact that all of Davis's tricks were 100% authentic. So he did the most reasonable thing he could think of.

He asked her if she would like to be an assistant at his next show.

Wheeling out the big contraption, Davis began setting up the box, which had five small openings, three on the front with two on the sides. "So what trick is this?" Jessica asked curiously.

"This," Davis says grunting from the effort of setting up the walls of the contraption, which were nearly twice his size, "is known as 'The Elastic Lady'."

"What does it do?" Jessica asked with curiosity.

"Why don't you step in and we'll find out together."

Jessica responded almost immediately with a firm "NO". This frustrated Davis to no end, because he desperately wanted to prove his tricks were real to her, and if she never agreed, he would never be able to show her they were real. So, he went with his plan B.

He asked her if she would like to go out for coffee instead.

The first date went well, even if Jessica only believed half of the stories he told, but he was nice the entire time, and gave her an enjoyable date. She politely accepted his offer to remain in contact as friends, as she was dating someone else at the time.

Throughout their contact with each other, Davis and Jessica became stronger and stronger friends. They told each other their daily struggles and victories. Introduced new friends, and had a great time together, to the point where they had empathy with one another for almost everything.

Jessica stepped in to the large box, sticking her arms out either side hole, her feet out the sides on the front face of the contraption, and her head out the middle. "Okay," Davis starts to say, latching the box, "This may feel a little weird, but if it ever gets to be too much, you can tell me to stop, got it?"

"Yep," Jessica replied, anxious but excited.

And thus Davis started his routine. First, he lightly grabbed Jessica's head, and began pulling it to the ground. At a certain point, he began meeting some resistance, as Jessica's body seemed firmly stuck in the position. However, muttering the incantation his father had taught him, Jessica's head was able to touch the ground with little to no resistance. "Woah," she exclaimed, feeling the alien sensation of her body's position on the inside of the box.

"Is this too much for you?" Davis asked.

"No, keep going."

Davis never wanted to admit it, but he had secretly had feelings for Jessica since the first time they had coffee together. As he got more famous, he began to desire her more and more, as she was the one thing he couldn't have. However, as he spent more time with her, he came to realize these selfish feelings were misguided, and learned that he truly loved Jessica for her personality, and not for the challenge of dating her.

Of the months and years of confiding in one another, the hardest days to deal with were the days after she had broken up with her ex-boyfriend, Brad. Brad was a big jock, who was nearly drafted into the NFL, but a positive drug test barred him from entering. Why Jessica ever dated him, Davis wasn't sure.

As much as he wanted to be sad for Jessica, Davis was ecstatic that day, because he realized that he could finally date the girl of his dreams. He waited 3 months, all the while consoling her and hiding his optimism. Finally, he had to know. He was going to take her out for dinner, and finally ask her to be his boyfriend.

Next, Davis took each hand, and repeated the process from Jessica's head, bringing them down to the ground. Jessica bit her lip as weird sensations flowed throughout her body. Then came the second part of the act. Taking each foot in a hand, Davis slowly brought her feet to the top of the box, reaching to push them to the top (as the box was nearly 8 feet tall).

Jessica, who was expecting there to be fake arms and legs to push out during the start of the act, was very much surprised in the position she was in. 'This position should not be possible, whether a box was constricting her movement or not,' she subconsciously thought. She began to question whether everything Davis had said about magic was real or not.

The date had gone well, both his and her meals were superb, and they had just returned to his mansion for some coffee.

Finally, Davis brought up all of his courage and prepared to ask his question.

"Jessica." He said, looking her dead in the eyes.

"Would you like to be my assistant?"

...

"Of course I would, Davis."

The final part of the act was the most impressive part, but also the part that required the most magic input. He raised her head and arms, while lowering her legs, so that they were all in the center of the box and in a straight line (a position that confused Jessica even more because she essentially was floating in midair).

Next, he tapped twice on her left arm, this caused it to start rotating counter-clockwise. Davis then tapped her left leg twice, and it began spinning counter-clockwise as well. He repeated the process with her head, right leg, and right arm, all spinning counter-clockwise and at the same speed. "Okay..." he said, pausing for dramatic effect, "Now, STOP!" As he uttered the command, he snapped his finger, and all of the body parts stopped spinning, leaving her head upside down, but the rest of her body parts right-side up. "and... REVERSE!" He again snapped his fingers, and the parts began spinning in a clockwise direction. Finally, they all settled back to their neutral position in reverse order, right arm, right leg, head, left leg, and left arm.

Finally, he grabbed each body part, returning it to the proper position from the beginning of the act. He then undid the latches on the box and helped her out. Jessica seemed a little dazed, but Davis then turned her to face toward their imaginary crowd, and helped her bow.

"So, how was that?" Davis asked.

"That was amazing," She replied. As Davis held her hands and looked passionately into her eyes, he leaned in, hoping for a kiss, and...

BZZZZRRTTT

the noise of her phone vibrating grabbed her attention, causing her to turn away from you. "Oops, that's probably my sister, I have to get that." She rushed towards her purse, which was on the other side of the room, not realizing that Davis was still holding her hands. It was only when she got to where her purse lied that she realized her arms stretched from his hands to the other side of the room. She looked at Davis with shock, screamed, and promptly fainted, while he still held her hand.

When she finally came to 30 minutes later, she quickly looked at her arms, and found that they were still stretched to their near 50 feet length, but were coiled up at her feet. "So Sleeping Beauty," said Davis, "You finally back with the land of the living?"

"What happened to my arms?" Jessica asks, a little frightened, but also intrigued.

"Oh that," Davis said with the undetectable hint of a smirk, "You may or may not like this ... To perform the trick, I increased your bodies elasticity, and ..."
153.title: The Elastic Lady

choices: "I can't help you with that, you can't touch the ground anymore"
"Side effect: Everytime you relax now, you will levitate"

info.brief_description: You are a stage magician with real magic powers.
info.description:
You are a magician with capable of doing illusions without using any tricks. For example; you can cut a women in half for REAL. Doing magic doesn't harm anyone and you can do what you can imagine.

Only 1 rule: Please I am totally sick of body part swapping. It is forbidden to take one's detached body part to another. Except for "Double Sawing" illusion.

You can do what you want in this story. But please be more creative. Even if your English is not good, you may add a chapter.

It is 18+. So you can have sexual things in this story. For example having sexual intercourse with only a lower body. And even foot fetish things with detached feet is acceptable (Actually, I like it). All fetishes are acceptable.

Enjoy!
